en: Study on the devastating flood: The risk of flooding in the Ahr Valley was probably massively underestimated. A new study on the Ahr Valley flood comes to a shocking conclusion. Accordingly, the disaster with 135 deaths was not an unforeseeable exceptional case. According to the research team, the official risk assessment was based on a fatal error.
la: Studere de vastatione diluvii: Periculum inundationis in Ahr Valle probabiliter minoris ponderis minoris fuit. Novum studium in Ahr Valley de diluvio ad turpem conclusionem venit. Proinde clades eximiae cum 135 mortes non inexspectatum casum. Secundum quadrigis investigationis, periculum officialis aestimatio in errore fatali fundata est.

title: Nach Kälte und Glätte : Bringt die Schneeschmelze jetzt das Hochwasser?
description: In den vergangenen Wochen ist ziemlich viel Wasser auf Deutschland niedergegangen, gespeichert als Schnee. Die rasant steigenden Temperaturen verflüssigen es nun. Grund zur Sorge?

en: After cold and slippery weather: Is the melting snow now bringing the flood? In the past few weeks a lot of water has fallen on Germany, stored as snow. The rapidly rising temperatures are now liquefying it. Reason for concern?
la: Post frigus et lubricum tempestas: nunc liquefactionem nix ferens diluvium? Praeteritis paucis hebdomadibus multum aquae in Germania in nix conditum cecidit. Temperatura rapide surgentia nunc liquefacit. Ratio curandi?
